main.name: Benjamin Taylor
main.description: I have a great passion for computer work, including the analysis of computer systems. I am always looking to continue learning, and am a quick study in new endeavors.
main.bio: My start in IT was at an MSP. From there I worked in the rigid realm of healthcare IT systems and discovered my passion for cybersecurity. I enjoy completing CTF challenges and learning in my homelab environment.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Science Degree in Criminal Justice

work.title: Information Technology Specialist
work.description: Analyzes, operates, administers, maintains, tests, and implements the network interconnection of devices, systems and communication services to meet the functional objectives of the Center.  Responsible for all aspects of the Tele-video network, VOIP telephone system, computer network including internet, and local area network.

work.title: Service Technician
work.description: Proactively maintain clients’ computer environments by analyzing requirements, resolving problems, and installing hardware and software solutions.
